title: Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League Battle Pass Leaks - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.17.23
description:
Go to http://patreon.com/kindafunny to get SO MUCH extra exclusive Kinda Funny content!

Blessing and Tim talk Suicide Squad leaks, Fire Emblem reviews, and The Last of Us HBO's success.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:42 - Housekeeping
Our Last of Us HBO episode 1 review is up right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunny

00:05:58 - Leaked Suicide Squad image appears to confirm battle pass and more
00:24:41 - Fire Emblem Engage review round up
00:33:02 - ‘The Last Of Us’ Becomes HBO’s Second-Largest Debut Since 2010
00:45:09 - Metal Gear Rising voice actor claims announcements in ‘the coming weeks’
00:50:10 - House of the Dead: Remake is heading to PlayStation 5 this week
00:52:37 - Out today
00:53:49 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Greg
